Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

(as of Nov 30,2022 13:35:39 UTC – Details)


With standout colors and a color blocking Enter key, ASUS VivoBook 15 OLED adds flair and dynamism to daily computing. With its AMD Ryzen processor, VivoBook 15 OLED provides the power you need to get things done. It also features fast data speeds of an SSD, giving you the best of both worlds in order to boost productivity. For Free Windows 11 upgrade eligible devices, visit ASUS Windows 11 website for more information.
Aspect Ratio:16:9
15.6 inch Full HD OLED NanoEdge bezel display with stunning 85% screen-to-body ratio
Latest 11th generation Intel Core i5-1135G7 Processor 2.4 GHz (8M Cache, up to 4.2 GHz) and Intel Iris Xᵉ Graphics
8GB DDR4 on board + 4GB DDR4 SO-DIMM RAM and 512GB PCIe NVMe M.2 SSD and Windows 10 Home
Ergonomic backlit keyboard along with a fingerprint sensor activated via Windows Hello
Comprehensive connections including USB 3.2 Type-C (Gen 1), USB 3.2 Type-A (Gen 1), USB 2.0, HDMI, and Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax) (*USB Transfer speed may vary. Learn more at ASUS website)

ASUS VivoBook 15 OLED

ASUS VivoBook is getting a new, bolder look thatʹs sure to get pulses racing. The slim and lightweight VivoBook 15 OLED is outfitted in Indie Black.


Previous page

  2. Ultimate professional-grade colors

    ASUS OLED laptops deliver exceptionally detailed and realistic visuals, with a cinema-grade 100% DCI-P3 color gamut. This means that the colors reproduced on the display are richer and more vivid

  3. 70% blue-light reduction for eye care

    ASUS OLED laptops emit 70% less harmful blue light, which helps reduce visual discomfort

    They’re also certified by TÜV Rheinland and SGS

  4. Color-perfect at any brightness

    ASUS OLED laptops can maintain good color reproduction at any brightness level, so you can adjust the screen’s brightness to suit working environment, while still enjoying exceptionally vivid colors.

  5. True black: See the unseen

    ASUS OLED laptops reproduce blacks perfectly. This enables extremely crisp and clear images even in the darkest scenes.

  6. Fastest response time for smooth actions

    ASUS OLED displays have a 0.2 ms response time – 50x faster than the average laptop LCD display. This ensures smoother fast-paced action scenes, low-latency gameplay, and subtle details.

Next page

Express yourself through color

VivoBook 15 OLED is about pushing boundaries and breaking new ground, and its bold look makes a statement.

Do it in style

The theme continues inside VivoBook 15 OLED, where a color blocking Enter key takes center stage when you open the lid.

It goes where you go

With an overall weight of just 3.97lb and an ultrathin profile, VivoBook 15 easily slips into your backpack so you can effortlessly take it along

Link to MyASUS

Link to MyASUS is a handy tool thatʹs part of the MyASUS app. It seamlessly integrates your ASUS PC with your mobile devices, boosting your productivity and allowing easier multitasking. Discover how Link to MyASUS makes your life so much simpler!

Fuel your productivity

Powered by the latest Intel 11th Gen processor with 12GB memory, VivoBook 15 offers the performance you need to get you through any task.

One-touch login

With the built-in fingerprint sensor in the touchpad and Windows Hello, just a single touch is all it takes to log in

Exactly your type

The full-size backlit keyboard is perfect for working. Its sturdy one-piece construction and 1.4mm key travel provide a comfortable typing experience.

Connecting the possibilities

VivoBook 15 features a reversible USB 3.2 Type-C (Gen 1), USB 3.2 Type-A (Gen 1) and USB 2.0 ports, HDMI output, and a microSD card reader

4
Price: $799.99 - $635.99

From the brand

V+bestlife

We are constantly discovering and meeting the needs of this changing world, we believe in V (victory), we can pursue the best life!

We think instant messaging will be more and more important in our lives and it is! Similarly, we believe that there will be more and more different changes in the demand for instant messaging. In order to allow more people who do not have instant messaging to join the information life, in this field, we are committed to discovering some distinctive and more Easy circulation of cell phones and telephone!

Information spreads faster in this world; we are committed to better understanding needs and producing products that better meet them!

How did we get our start?

We found that some needs were not being met, and then we wanted to address the situation.

What makes our products unique?

Whether it is in different countries, different regions, or different concepts and consumption habits, the development of the world makes consumer demand change extremely fast and huge. We are constantly discovering this change, catching up with this change, meeting this change, and making our products more in line with consumer needs. This is our starting point, and this is why we think our products are different.

IP12 PRO Android Smartphone

IP12 PRO Unlocked Android Smartphone ,6.26in Waterdrop Full Screen Dual SIM Cell Phone ,Ultra Thin Mobile Phone

At Vbestlife, our goal is to provide innovative, high-quality products that everyone can afford. Quality is the key! If for any reason, you don’t like Vbestlife’s smartphones, please tell us and we will help you solve it.

Excellent Smartphone

High Definition Camera

The smart phone is equipped with a high-definition camera, with bright colors, and each photo is as beautiful as a wallpaper. It is deeply developed and more complete and smooth. Front camera: 2MP, f/2.0 aperture, fixed focal length, rear camera: 2MP (color, f/1.8 aperture) autofocus.

Dual Card Dual Standby

This smart phone supports the simultaneous use of two SIM cards for data and phone calls, or the simultaneous use of memory cards for data storage. Scalable storage up to 128GB (128G memory card not included).

Battery Capacity

The 6.26-inch high-definition full-fit water drop screen is equipped with a 1950mah lithium-ion battery. The powerful processor greatly improves the running speed, frame rate and smoothness of the picture when playing large-scale games and multitasking.

The weight of the smartphone is only 365g. When you hold it in your hand, the phone is still small and light, which is convenient for you to use. This is a high-performance smartphone with both practicality and professionalism.
